nodes.name: CoToken

nodes.documentation:
@dev A function to calculate the price for the purchase of n CO tokens based on the curve f(x) = 0.01x + 0.2 , x ∈ ℕ.
@param _n number of tokens to be purchased.
nodes.name: buyPrice

nodes.documentation:
@dev A function to calculate the price for the sale of n CO tokens based on the curve on the curve f(x) = 0.01x + 0.2 , x ∈ ℕ.
@param _n number of tokens to be sold.
nodes.name: sellPrice

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Must send correct purchase price to buy tokens."

arguments.value: Must send correct purchase price to buy tokens.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Must send correct purchase price to buy tokens."

nodes.documentation:
@dev A function to creates tokens if the correct current price is transferred to the contract. The price is determined by the buyPrice function.
@param _n number of tokens to be purchased.
nodes.name: mint

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "only the owner can sell tokens back to the curve and withdraw the funds"

arguments.value: only the owner can sell tokens back to the curve and withdraw the funds

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "only the owner can sell tokens back to the curve and withdraw the funds"

nodes.name: burn

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "can only be called if all CO tokens belong to the owner"

arguments.value: can only be called if all CO tokens belong to the owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "can only be called if all CO tokens belong to the owner"

nodes.documentation:
@dev A destroy function that destructs the contract (see selfdestruct ). This function can only be called by the owner and it can only
be called if all CO tokens belong to the owner .
nodes.name: destroy

nodes.documentation:
@dev A destroy function that destructs the contract (see selfdestruct ). This function can only be called by the owner and it can only
be called if all CO tokens belong to the owner .
nodes.name: destroy

buyPrice(uint256).details: A function to calculate the price for the purchase of n CO tokens based on the curve f(x) = 0.01x + 0.2 , x ∈ ℕ.

params._n: number of tokens to be purchased.

destroy().details: A destroy function that destructs the contract (see selfdestruct ). This function can only be called by the owner and it can only be called if all CO tokens belong to the owner .

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

sellPrice(uint256).details: A function to calculate the price for the sale of n CO tokens based on the curve on the curve f(x) = 0.01x + 0.2 , x ∈ ℕ.

params._n: number of tokens to be sold.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
